desc: Bounce Mkt offers the best in baby and kids pre-loved, gently used clothing and accessories. We are on a mission to keep kids’ clothes out of the garbage and in the close

layout.text: CLOTHES SO GREAT THEY DESERVE TO BE LOVED AGAIN

We buy and sell the best of pre-loved kids’ clothing: gently-used items in excellent condition; from brands you love; rigorously inspected, freshly laundered, and ready for another round of memory-making moments. Bounce Mkt makes kids' used clothes shopping as easy on you as it is on the planet.
